title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5109 - Financial Controls For Video Lottery Gaming Agents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5109 - Financial Controls For Video Lottery Gaming Agents

State Regulations
§ 5109.1 - Annual audit and other related reports
§ 5109.2 - Submission of standard financial and statistical reports
§ 5109.3 - Format and structure of accounting records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 5109

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
